data.name: Firearms Factory
data.detailed_description:
• An adventure that will last from the beginning of the 1st World War to the end of the 2nd World War is waiting for you.
  • You will start to produce weapons in a small workshop, as the weapons you produce win the wars, you will gain money and experience.
  • With this experience and money, You can manufacture pistols, SMGs, assault rifles, bolt actions, and more...
  • Maybe if your government trusts you enough, you'll be well-equipped to produce tanks, what do you think?
data.about_the_game:
• An adventure that will last from the beginning of the 1st World War to the end of the 2nd World War is waiting for you.
  • You will start to produce weapons in a small workshop, as the weapons you produce win the wars, you will gain money and experience.
  • With this experience and money, You can manufacture pistols, SMGs, assault rifles, bolt actions, and more...
  • Maybe if your government trusts you enough, you'll be well-equipped to produce tanks, what do you think?
data.short_description: In 1909, your workshop that produced sweet candies for children was hastily turned into a firearms workshop, according to an order from the government. Are you ready to make them win the war?
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB or Better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz quad core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB Ram or Better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
